attributes.action: INTRODUCE 'FREE' CAR PARKING AT ALL FORESTS  MANAGED BY THE FORESTRY COMMISSION
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are all reminded on a daily basis to take more exercise, this applies to all age groups,I find it abhorrent that to walk and enjoy the natural surroundings of any forest managed by the Forestry Commission I am obliged to pay a fee, in the form of a exorbitant car parking charge. This deters many, especially the elderly from visiting our forests, I therefore petition the PM to make all car parking free at our much loved forests.
